text: Eninum avviruvarukkum maraintirunta avarkalutaiya (utalai) manattai avarkalukku velippatuttum poruttu saittan avviruvarin ullankalil (tavarana ennankalai) ucalatac ceytan; (avarkalai nokki, "atan kaniyai ninkal pucittal) ninkal iruvarum malakkukalay vituvirkal, allatu (iccuvanapatiyil) enrennum tankivituvirkal enpatarkakaveyanri (veretarkum,) inta marattai vittum unkalai unkal iraivan tatukkavillai" enru kurinan
